TextView.android:text:
Using this tool you are able to spot UPnP devices on your network and browse their services/actions/arguments.

 When you see the list of arguments of an action you can invoke the given action selecting 'Invoke' option from the menu.

 This application is in its early stage of development, therefore bugs shouldn't not be a surprise. However, we work hard on fixing those.

 The source code of this application is available from https://github.com/mikebevz/UPnPBrowser

 If you need a feature or want to report a bug - make a new issue on Github.

 In case you just wanna say thank you drop me a letter at myb@theappfellas.com.

 We use http://bugsense.com for collecting the crash reports that are automatically sent to the BugSense server and we've got notification that a new bug appeared.

 Cheers,

 Mike Bevz

 myb@theappfellas.com
